name: Viking Brothers 3
description: Ready your weapons and answer the call of the gods to save the universe from evil!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 3 GHZ processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space
